oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Doctor Alexander Jackson to his wife
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter written at Carnton Plantation, Franklin, Tennessee, from Dr. Alexander Jackson to his wife, Unis Jackson, in Jackson, Tenessee, describing Colonel McGavock's Confederate cemetery from the Battle of Franklin.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
